summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 LINCOLN MKZ. THE CONTACT STATED THAT NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V384000 (AIR BAGS) HAD EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE REPAIR. THE CONTACT RECEIVED THE RECALL NOTIFICATION TWO YEARS AGO. THE CONTACT MENTIONED THAT FORD LINCOLN PINEWOOD BLVD OF FLORIDA ADVISED THAT PART WAS UNAVAILABLE FOR THE REPAIR. THE CONTACT DID NOT EXPERIENCE A FAILURE. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS REMEDY NOT YET AVAILABLE.
